recommendations: Update to Node.js 25+ for best performance
Update to Bevy 0.14.0 for latest features

bevy.error: ENOENT: no such file or directory, open './rust-engines/Cargo.toml'

render.content:
services:
  - type: web
    name: cathedral-web
    runtime: node
    plan: free
    buildCommand: |
      curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_25.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
      npm install -g pnpm@9.15.0
      pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
      pnpm run build
    startCommand: |
      pnpm --filter @openspec/magnum-opus run preview
    healthCheckPath: /
    envVars:
      - key: NODE_VERSION
        value: "25"
      - key: NPM_VERSION
        value: "10"
      - key: PNPM_VERSION
        value: "9.15.0"
      - key: NODE_ENV
        value: production
      - key: TURBO_VERSION
        value: "2.0.0"
      - key: PLATFORM
        value: render
    domains:
      - cathedral-avalon-labs.onrender.com
      - avalon-labs-cathedral.netlify.app
      - cathedral-rosslyn-explorer.netlify.app

  - type: web
    name: cathedral-api
    runtime: node
    plan: free
    buildCommand: |
      curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_25.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
      npm install -g pnpm@9.15.0
      pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
      pnpm --filter apps/worker run build
    startCommand: |
      pnpm --filter apps/worker run start
    envVars:
      - key: NODE_VERSION
        value: "25"
      - key: NODE_ENV
        value: production
      - key: PLATFORM
        value: render
    domains:
      - cathedral-api.onrender.com

  - type: cron
    name: cathedral-updater
    schedule: "0 */6 * * *"
    runtime: node
    buildCommand: |
      curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_25.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
      npm install -g pnpm@9.15.0
      pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
    startCommand: |
      pnpm run cathedral-full-stack
      pnpm run db-export
    envVars:
      - key: NODE_VERSION
        value: "25"
      - key: PLATFORM
        value: render
    region: oregon

cloudflare.content:
name = "avalon-labs"
compatibility_date = "2024-12-01"
node_compat = true

[build]
command = "pnpm turbo run build --filter=apps/web"
cwd = "../.."
watch_dir = "."

[build.upload]
format = "modules"

[[build.upload.rules]]
type = "ESModule"
globs = ["**/*.js"]

[[build.upload.rules]]
type = "CommonJS"
globs = ["**/*.cjs"]

[vars]
NODE_VERSION = "25"
PLATFORM = "cloudflare"
PNPM_VERSION = "9.15.0"
TURBO_VERSION = "2.0.0"

# Environment variables for production
[env.production.vars]
NODE_ENV = "production"
NODE_VERSION = "25"
PLATFORM = "cloudflare"

# Cloudflare Pages Functions
[functions]
directory = "functions/"

# KV storage for Cathedral data
[[kv_namespaces]]
binding = "CATHEDRAL_NODES"
id = "cathedral_nodes_kv"
preview_id = "cathedral_nodes_kv_preview"

# Durable Objects for real-time features
[[durable_objects.bindings]]
name = "CATHEDRAL_ROOMS"
class_name = "CathedralRoom"

# Additional bindings for Cathedral features
[[durable_objects.bindings]]
name = "GAMESTATE"
class_name = "GameState"

# Environment-specific configurations
[env.staging.vars]
NODE_ENV = "staging"
PLATFORM = "cloudflare-staging"

[env.development.vars]
NODE_ENV = "development"
PLATFORM = "cloudflare-dev"

nextSteps: Update Node.js to v25 or later
Run version check again after updates
